question: The number of atoms in 4.5 g of a face-centred cubic crystal with edge length 300 pm is: (Given density = 10 g cm⁻³ and Nᴀ = 6.022×10²³).
explanation: Volume of unit cell = a³ = (300 × 10⁻¹⁰ cm)³ = 27 × 10⁻²⁴ cm³.
Mass of unit cell = Density × Volume = 10 × 27 × 10⁻²⁴ = 27 × 10⁻²³ g.
Number of unit cells = Total Mass / Mass of unit cell = 4.5 / (27 × 10⁻²³) = (1/6) × 10²³.
In FCC, atoms per unit cell = 4.
